about_the_game:
Explore fantastic environments as Lula, as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny. First Collect the broken crystal shards then follow the unraveling poems of the story.

GENIE is a couple of hours of a relaxing experience. A rich story that's presented in a poetic form combined with immersive graphics, fantasy style, gorgeous natural environments that take place in varied eras, made with Unreal Engine 5, and a charming soundtrack to make it a journey you may not soon forget. Enjoy the environments!

In the first half of the levels, the player collects crystal shards scattered around the map. When they collect all the shards, the poem-spots start to appear one by one. When the player stands on them, they have to find a light source around them and focus on it. When that happens, the camera view changes and the narration begins. After that is done, the next poem-spot reveals, and so on until the next level begins.

GENIE is the re-creation of Drizzlepath: Genie which was released in 2016. The environments are made from scratch, the story is altered and transformed into poem form. A highly talented voice actor has recorded the full narration of the game. The music is revisited (with a single exception) with a selection of more atmospheric tracks.

The game is divided into 15 parts which take about 5-10 minutes each; the progress is saved at their beginnings.

PS: The core aspect of this game is the atmosphere. It offers almost zero interaction and is recommended for those who mostly seek to experience the mood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz, AMD Athlon 64 X2 2GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 or AMD RADEON RX 470 (These are for 1080p resolution, lowest graphics settings and 60 FPS most of the time)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8.1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: This game needs all Windows updates installed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT (These are for 4K resolution, highest graphics settings and minimum 60 FPS)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8.1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended. For additional immersion use gamepad with force feedback.
